description: This is an HTML file containing the structure, styles, and client-side JavaScript for a web-based database viewer interface. It provides UI components to browse databases, tables, and view data, with functions handling fetching data via API and rendering interactive tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar menu.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting UI states.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses a database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates an HTML table representation of data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual cell HTML, including handling large or object content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content on click.
